revised_title: Rutherford's Legacy and Swift Rotation: Recollections and Applications
tldr: This article discusses Rutherford's significant contributions to the field of nuclear physics, including the discovery of the atomic nucleus and the first nuclear reaction. It also explores the use of swift rotation in physics, particularly in the development of velocity-spectrometers and velocity-selectors for molecules. The author shares personal recollections and anecdotes from his time working with Rutherford's colleagues.
